com.JavaIndexer.generics
Class Document

java.lang.Object
  com.JavaIndexer.generics.Parameterizable
      com.JavaIndexer.generics.Document

public class Document
extends Parameterizable

Code for storing and processing individual documents of any type.

readLocalText

public void readLocalText(java.lang.String filepath)
Reads text from a local file. Exceptions are not caught by name. Rather, all exceptions are handled through just printing the error message to stdout. This should probably be changed for robustness. The raw text of the file is stored for quick access in an array.

readStringText

public void readStringText(java.lang.String text)

readURLText

public void readURLText(java.lang.String url)
Reads text from a local file. Exceptions are not caught by name. Rather, all exceptions are handled through just printing the error message to stdout. This should probably be changed for robustness. The raw text of the file is stored for quick access in an array. Modeled from readLocalText PMJ 10/25/08

getProcessedText

public java.lang.String getProcessedText()
Returns text with preprocessing done. Preprocessing can include stripping whitespace or normalizing the case

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size of the document. Size is determined by the number of characters plus whitespace

hasBeenProcessed

public boolean hasBeenProcessed()
Checks to see if this document has been processed with tagger.

Returns:
boolean value indicating whether the tagger associated with this document have been applied to the document
